contents: Article 25-2 (Meeting Minutes) The secretary shall prepare meeting minutes recording the meeting date and place, attendees, discussion details, etc., obtain approval from the chairperson, keep the minutes, and summarize the main contents of the minutes and make them public. However, if the committee determines that it is worth protecting as a secret or if there is a risk of information leakage if disclosed, the meeting minutes may not be made public by resolution of the committee, specifying the reason. Newly established 2022. 9. 28.
